definition: to take down (in writing)/notes/a type of literature consisting mainly of short sketches/CL:本[ben3]
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots
Death note (Japanese: デスノート), translation of cult manga series by author ŌBA Tsugumi 大場鶇|大场鸫[Da4 chang3 Dong1] (pen-name) and illustrator OBATA Takeshi 小畑健[Xiao3 tian2 Jian4]

pinyin: bi3 ji4 ben3 ji4 suan4 ji1

definition: Notes on a Minutely Observed Thatched Hut by Ji Yun 紀昀|纪昀[Ji4 Yun2], novel of the supernatural/The Thatched Study of Close Scrutiny
pinyin: Yue4 wei1 Cao3 tang2 Bi3 ji4

sentences.english: All laptops in our shop are brand new and authentic.
sentences.chinese: 本店所售笔记本电脑均为全新正品行货。

sentences.english: The newly discovered notes are nothing more than Jack's personal journal.
sentences.chinese: 新发现的笔记只不过是杰克的个人日记。

sentences.english: Here is the best system for note-taking and studying I've discovered so far.
sentences.chinese: 这里有一种最佳的听课记笔记学习系统，据我所知。

sentences.english: It wouldn't hurt to read over my notes.
sentences.chinese: 最好能再读一遍我的笔记。

sentences.english: The main purpose of the notebook is to help you prepare a weekly study schedule.
sentences.chinese: 这个笔记本的主要用途是帮你准备一周学习计划。

sentences.english: You need to be able to listen while you are writing down the important parts of the lecture.
sentences.chinese: 你需要在记好笔记的同时听讲师在讲些什么。

sentences.english: He transcribed two paragraphs from the book into his notebook.
sentences.chinese: 他把书中的两段抄在笔记本上。

sentences.english: They manufacture paper supplies, notebooks, and Trapper Keepers, among other things.
sentences.chinese: 他们制造纸张，笔记本，夹子和其他许多文具。

sentences.english: What do you think of the keyboard on this laptop?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得这种笔记本电脑的键盘怎么样？

sentences.english: He says the special laptop is an example of appropriate technology.
sentences.chinese: 他称特殊的笔记本是“适用技术”的一个典型。

sentences.english: And there are tons and tons of pieces of script pages and scribbled notes.
sentences.chinese: 还有成吨成吨的剧本及涂写的笔记。

sentences.english: A Swiss was busy making notes.
sentences.chinese: 一个瑞士人忙着记笔记。

sentences.english: Don’t panic, I’m talking about just 15 minutes per day when your notebook reigns.
sentences.chinese: 别难过，我说的是每天用15分钟让笔记本做主。

sentences.english: Please take yours to get your note-books.
sentences.chinese: 请按顺序取走你们的笔记本。

sentences.english: When she was young , she used to store quotations from poems in a notebook.
sentences.chinese: 他年轻时，常常在笔记本里记下一些摘引诗歌的内容。

sentences.english: Sitting in the corner listening, watching everybody, taking notes.
sentences.chinese: 坐在角落里倾听，看着每个人，做笔记。

definition: to thumb through/to flip through (a book)
book/notebook/Japanese-style self-published comic (esp. an erotic one), aka "dōjinshi"/CL:本[ben3]/edition
to annotate/to add marginal comments on/criticism/marginalia
the palest ink is better than the best memory (idiom)
pinyin: hao3 ji4 xing4 bu4 ru2 lan4 bi3 tou2

definition: to study attentively (a book)/to delve into
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
